title: How Hard to Push

en: You've gotten so much done so far - everything is finally starting to look like a fully-realized product. But you're staying up late and waking up early, working for hours without breaks. You've been subsisting on passion and the knowledge that this last stretch is really the last one, but how much longer can you last?

no_caption: Make it the best it can be

en: It'd be much worse to get sick and lose the rest of the time you do have. Time to take a break.
Another fix in, another step closer to perfection.
